Sampling using normal distributions for Global optimization applications by Sotirios Hatzis (In Greek). Subspace optimization extending the Dog-Leg Algorithm by Arsinoi Rizou (In Greek). Supervised Ph. D. Dissertations "Global Optimization: Methods, Software and Applications" by Ioannis Tsoulos (in Greek). "Methods for Local and Global Optimization" by Costas Voglis (In English).
